favourite.article: Wonderful reminder of Christ's perfect plan to love us, save us. Keep us and promise us an eternal home with all who trust and believe in Him!!!!!
What a blessed assurance! Forever, His promises/words are settled. God be praised!
God is faithful. I love this hymn.
Very good song.
Am so inspired by this song. Been feeling down the last few weeks and suddenly started singing this song. Today read a message from Joel Osteen, about standing on God's Promises. Feeling blessed
Praise God!!! The promises of God stand forever and cannot fail. Thank you for uploading this song and God bless you all. Peace!
Very appropriate words as my bible study group learn from the book of Nehemiah.
This a wonderful hymn, it makes today's sunday service a blessing. God bless the composer and the publisher of this site.
Glory be to God. God bless the composer, this website. I am blessed & refreshed. Grace flows through this song.
Resting in my Saviour as my All in all, I shall not fail. Amen!!! Thank You Lord Jesus for Your Sacrifice.

Begone unbelief in Jesus Name Amen. The promises of God stand forever. The word of God cannot be broken. His words are ever sure and ever faithful. Trust on Trust on Believer! Never doubt but doubt your doubt always. God cannot fail. His words will surely come to pass. Thanks for uploading this song and God bless you all. Peace!!!
I love this beautiful hymn that reminds us of the numerous promises of God to us for now and eternity. Thank You Father. Thank You Jesus. I have a loving Father indeed.
I was blessed with this hymn.

Great words! I am so inspired by this song, Have faith in God, you are never alone. Trust God's word, though trial may come prayer and confidence in His promises takes away all our burdens and worries.
Satan is so good at sowing doubts, but the promises of God as written in the Word will stand forever and Jesus will never leave nor forsake me! Thank You, Father.
my favorite of all hymns.
Great song. Awesome lyrics and amazing tune. Faith building every time.

Are you standing on the promises of God? Oh Lord deliver us from every spirit of unbelief in Jesus Name Amen. The promises of God cannot fail. The word of God cannot be broken. His words are ever sure and ever faithful. Trust on Trust on Believer! Never doubt but doubt your doubt always. God cannot fail. His words will surely come to pass. Thanks for uploading this song and God bless you all. Shalom!!!

The word of God is sweet like honey dripping from the honeycomb. Matt 24:35 - heaven and earth will pass away but my words will never pass away. The promises of God gives joy and happiness. This song is a daily reminder that the promises of God is forever.
My favorite hymn that always build my assurance of faith in God.
Words to live by...an outstanding message and a reason for our Hope ! I love the message of Jesus ...words to live by

This is my all life favorite, from the day I opened my eyes, my parents and grandparent was singing Standing on the Promises of God, and while I was traveling through the deep valley of sin, I hear our family choir singing in church this song, that when I realized to survive in life, keep on and stand on your promises you made with your living God, and today, I am standing tall and praising Him, Amen.

Are you standing on the promises of God?. These promises cannot fail. The word of God cannot be broken. His words are ever sure and ever faithful. Trust on Trust on Believer! Never doubt but doubt your doubt always. God cannot fail. His words will surely come to pass. Thanks for uploading this song and God bless you all. Shalom!!!
There is no life without God the Father, Son and the Holy Ghost and of a truth His promises never fail. He gives us hope even at the peak of adversity.
It is great to hope. Three things remain: faith, hope and love. The Lord gives us hope. He saved us from death, He needs our heart. Glory be to God!
Keep standing on the promises of God. I can never be done with hymns. Hh where are the saints? Singing to Jesus Christâ€”the source of my life.
The word of GOD is SURE and STEADFAST. IT CAN NOT BE BROKEN. So believe IT, confess IT and Apply IT. AND IT SHALL WORK FOR: U. IJN amen

I am standing on the promises of God. These promises cannot fail.The word of God cannot be broken. His words are ever sure and ever faithful. Trust on Trust on Believer! Never doubt but doubt your doubt always. Thanks for uploading this song and God bless you all. Shalom!!!
His promises are sure, I can sleep without fret, thanks for providing this lyrics.
Thank you. This was one of the great hymns I so enjoyed when doing volunteer work in Uganda.
Christ Jesus is the only solid foundation and His promises will never fail.
This old Hymn has been singing in my spirit all day. Thank you for providing this website.
I really love this song. Even during my young age until I still continue singing this. Keep on standing with God.

I cannot stop singing this hymn truly. I really believed that Almighty God is worthy since my mother passed away and left me with many young siblings. Since then till now we have been overcoming the storms. He said in His word "Fear Not". That is why I am saying Standing on the Promises I cannot Fail.

This is my consoling hymn since January 26. It became my hope in Jesus when my assistant went to jail just because somebody did not like the Truth. I am standing on His Promises that my assistant will be free.
A song worth more than a thousand prayer points. Your only companion for faith, courage, strength, and trials. God is truely awesome!
This is indeed awesome, HIS promises are new every morning. I cannot stop playing the hymn all day.

Always Pleased and Touched by the words sung in this Song...Thank You Lord for the message that it contains with it Lost souls will be found, its my Prayer that you find us and take us in that Kingdom. Maranatha - Jesus is Coming Again. Shalom Shalom
Indeed inspiring. This is one song I need at this moment to remind me of God's unfailing love and promises.
Lovely traditional song. My daughter and I have been singing/humming/whistling it constantly since Friday. The old ones are the best. I chose it for this evening's service.
My monumental thanks to the artist who was led by the Holy Spirit to compose this song. Sincerely, I love it with my body, soul and spirit.

This song was sung on my last sabbath before a cochlear implant. Till then, I was so unsure of what would happen. After this song I knew I could trust in God and His promises. And I now thank Him eternally for the successful operation. He is a faithful God...
Thank for Russell Carter's life. Such an inspired hymn.
This is such a reassuring and consoling hymn. Thank God for His faithfulness and everlasting promises. I thank God for the composer and for those who have made it available.
Those who ask in faith go forth praising in hope. Thank a million!
I am so grateful to God that there is a hymnal page like this. Thank you Jesus, they are not lost at all..
The word of God is what keeps me going every day of my life. I strongly hold firm to HIS words because there are ye and amen.
The God factor that never fail if everything fails the word of the Lord will not fail.

I want to thank those responsible for this site and this song that I found tonight. It is giving me great comfort thru a difficult time in my life and tomorrow I will be standing on the promises of God to give me the words to speak when I know that on my own, I could not. Thank You God my Savior.
Every line so comforting so assuring. Lord, give me the grace I need to really stand on Your promises at This critical period of my life in Jesus name. Amen.

article.author: Andreas Voigt (Andy Voight For English People)

favourite.article: I am relying on the prophecies of God. That's why I love this song, especially if it's sung by the Chuck Waggon Gang.
What a wonderful song affirming believer's confidence in God - Adonai!!!
Awesome Song. It feels great to sing along.
This song is a soul lifting inspirational lines, so much of an angelic lyrics and rhythm. I am glad I believe!

What a song to behold, in all its phase it reminded us of the sterling promises of God, the unfailing promises of God. When troubles blows, when tragedy strikes, when life on the raging sea, the promise of God is so sure and ever comforting. Right now this song is comforting my heart through the challenges I went through yesterday. I will never forget His promises for my life.

This is one of the songs that made me a man. I remember when the fear of getting married overwhelmed me, in the night time God reminded me about this song and I was filled with His courage. The song was used as our recessional hymn on our wedding day. And till today, HE never failed us. Praise the LORD.

The gift of Christ is God's way of settling all imbalances of life. His promises have not changed. It is settled in heaven, and still redeems anyone that claims them. I am standing everyday on these promises. A mere man may not understand, but the spirit world do!
In a world that is filled with uncertainties, it is comforting to know that children of God can rely on and hold on to the promises of God who is ever faithful.
God's promises is the life line and anchor of every believer. They are strength to the weak and help to the helpless. What a joy to know that we have promises that can never fail.

As followers of Jesus Christ, the words to this song reminds us that we are never alone in our trials, no matter how hard. The Promises of God are Yea and Amen! In this trying time we lean even more heavily on those Promises in His Word!
It's a wonderful thing to know that we can stand on the promises of God knowing they will not fail and knowing we will not fall. I am so thankful for that! Praise God!

This song is quite encouraging during this time in my life when everything in the natural realm and our economy belies God's Word seemingly-everything has been going contrary for me, but this precious song encourages me to continue standing on God's Word because the Word of God is alive and it can not fail me and I shall prevail-not go down in defeat.

Thank you for this wonderful song. It reminds us of God's faithfulness in our missions here in Cambodia for almost 5 years now. Glory to God for calling us into his wonderful service! We can always stand in the unfailing promises of God in our lives! Thank you very much for your good work in God!

Thanks for putting this up.
It reminds us of the unchangeableness of our good God and His love for us. I also like the part about the Spirit's Sword. We need to be constituted with the Word to such an extent that we can stand against the enemy by God's word.

Thank God for the writers of these hymns of old. They speak volumes of our Daddy's goodness, I grew up with these songs when i lived in the flesh and did not mean much to me till I made Christ my savior and thes words have taken up a new meaning to me.

I remember a lot of the classics that one does not hear that often these days.
They were the ones I grew up with. They sing my praises as I once did. The new ones are just as important for future generations as the classics are for mine.
This, by far, was one of my favorites. We stood on the promises of an everlasting God and His Son's words as found in the New Testament.
